entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers this morning. Snow level rising to 1900 metres this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 10. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Snow level 2000 metres lowering to valley bottom late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning and early afternoon. Snow level rising to 1800 metres in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 24 April 2023
